## isOnCloudRun variable

Check whether a service is running on Cloud Run or not.

- https://cloud.google.com/anthos/run/docs/reference/container-contract\#env-vars

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isOnCloudRun: (env: NodeJS.ProcessEnv) => boolean
```
